meanings.definition: The act of creating and distributing video content over the internet.
meanings.sent1: Vodcasting allows people to share videos online easily.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching vodcasting shows on my computer.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried vodcasting its playful antics to the world.
meanings.sent4: Her vodcasting of emotions through dance was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The vodcasting of breaking news made the information spread quickly.

meanings.sent1: I listen to a vodcasting series about science every week.
meanings.sent2: She subscribed to a vodcasting channel for cooking tips.
meanings.sent3: The aliens in the movie had a vodcasting show about space travel.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a vodcasting library of memories.
meanings.sent5: The vodcasting on gardening inspired her to start her own garden.
